languages.text: "В случае отказа от сотрудничества есть способы сделать данные ксеноединицы покорными. Если провести трепанацию, иссечь некоторые области височных долей, запечь лобную кору мозга и перекинуть прямой электродный мост к соматосенсорному отделу... Подобная операция без соответствующих инструментов будет мучительной, но полезной и познавательной".

"In the event these xenos units refuse to cooperate, there are ways to ensure their obedience. A lobotomy to excise certain parts of the temporal lobes, cauterise the prefrontal cortex, and extend a direct electrode bridge to their somatosensory cortex... A surgery of this kind, if performed without the necessary equipment, will be excruciating, but useful and informative."
languages.original_text: "В случае отказа от сотрудничества есть способы сделать данные ксеноединицы покорными. Если провести трепанацию, иссечь некоторые области височных долей, запечь лобную кору мозга и перекинуть прямой электродный мост к соматосенсорному отделу... Подобная операция без соответствующих инструментов будет мучительной, но полезной и познавательной".

traits.locale_text: "In the event that these xenos units refuse to cooperate, there are ways to ensure their obedience. A lobotomy to excise certain parts of the temporal lobes, cauterise the frontal cortex, and extend a direct electrode bridge to the somesthetic area... A surgery of this kind, if performed without the necessary equipment, will be excruciating but useful and informative."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Si ces unités xénos refusent de coopérer, il existe des moyens de s'assurer de leur obéissance. Nous pourrions procéder à une lobotomie pour exciser certaines parties des lobes temporaux, cautériser le cortex préfrontal et intégrer un pont d'électrodes direct à leur cortex somato-sensoriel... Une telle opération, si elle est pratiquée sans l'équipement nécessaire, sera insupportablement douloureuse, mais utile et instructive. »
languages.original_text: "In the event these xenos units refuse to cooperate, there are ways to ensure their obedience. A lobotomy to excise certain parts of the temporal lobes, cauterise the prefrontal cortex, and extend a direct electrode bridge to their somatosensory cortex... A surgery of this kind, if performed without the necessary equipment, will be excruciating, but useful and informative."

traits.locale_text: « Si ces unités xénos refusent de coopérer, il existe des moyens de s'assurer de leur obéissance. Nous pourrions procéder à une lobotomie pour exciser certaines parties des lobes temporaux, cautériser le cortex préfrontal et intégrer un pont d'électrodes direct à leur cortex somato-sensoriel... Une telle opération, si elle est pratiquée sans l'équipement nécessaire, sera insupportablement douloureuse, mais utile et instructive. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “如果这些异形单位拒绝合作，我有办法确保让他们服从。我可以对他们进行额叶切除手术，切除颞叶的某些部分，烧灼前额叶皮层，并将直接电极连通到他们的体感皮层……这样的手术如果没有必要的设备，会带来相当程度的痛苦，但却非常有用。”
languages.original_text: "In the event these xenos units refuse to cooperate, there are ways to ensure their obedience. A lobotomy to excise certain parts of the temporal lobes, cauterise the prefrontal cortex, and extend a direct electrode bridge to their somatosensory cortex... A surgery of this kind, if performed without the necessary equipment, will be excruciating, but useful and informative."

traits.locale_text: “如果这些异形单位拒绝合作，我有办法确保让他们服从。我可以对他们进行额叶切除手术，切除颞叶的某些部分，烧灼前额叶皮层，并将直接电极连通到他们的体感皮层……这样的手术如果没有必要的设备，会带来相当程度的痛苦，但却非常有用。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族たちが協力を拒否した場合、彼らの服従を確保する方法があります。ロボトミー手術で側頭葉の一部を切除し、前頭前野を焼灼し、体性感覚皮質に直接電極を接続するのです。この種の手術は、万が一必要な設備がない状態で行った場合、苦痛は耐え難いものにはなります。ただし役には立ちますし、有益な情報も得られます」
languages.original_text: "In the event these xenos units refuse to cooperate, there are ways to ensure their obedience. A lobotomy to excise certain parts of the temporal lobes, cauterise the prefrontal cortex, and extend a direct electrode bridge to their somatosensory cortex... A surgery of this kind, if performed without the necessary equipment, will be excruciating, but useful and informative."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族たちが協力を拒否した場合、彼らの服従を確保する方法があります。ロボトミー手術で側頭葉の一部を切除し、前頭前野を焼灼し、体性感覚皮質に直接電極を接続するのです。この種の手術は、万が一必要な設備がない状態で行った場合、苦痛は耐え難いものにはなります。ただし役には立ちますし、有益な情報も得られます」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Falls diese Xenos-Einheiten nicht kooperieren wollen, gibt es Möglichkeiten, ihren Gehorsam zu bekommen. Eine Lobotomie, bei der wir bestimmte Teile der Schläfenlappen entfernen, den präfrontalen Kortex veröden und eine direkte Elektrodenbrücke zum somatosensorischen Kortex legen ... Eine solche Operation ohne die notwendige Ausrüstung wird die reinste Qual, aber wir werden sicher an unsere Informationen kommen."
languages.original_text: "In the event these xenos units refuse to cooperate, there are ways to ensure their obedience. A lobotomy to excise certain parts of the temporal lobes, cauterise the prefrontal cortex, and extend a direct electrode bridge to their somatosensory cortex... A surgery of this kind, if performed without the necessary equipment, will be excruciating, but useful and informative."

traits.locale_text: "Falls diese Xenos-Einheiten nicht kooperieren wollen, gibt es Möglichkeiten, ihren Gehorsam zu bekommen. Eine Lobotomie, bei der wir bestimmte Teile der Schläfenlappen entfernen, den präfrontalen Kortex veröden und eine direkte Elektrodenbrücke zum somatosensorischen Kortex legen ... Eine solche Operation ohne die notwendige Ausrüstung wird die reinste Qual, aber wir werden sicher an unsere Informationen kommen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «En caso de que estas unidades xenos se nieguen a cooperar, existen maneras de garantizar su obediencia. Una lobotomía para extirpar ciertas partes de sus lóbulos temporales, cauterizar la corteza prefrontal e implantarle un electrodo directamente en el sistema somatosensorial... Una cirugía tan invasiva llevada a cabo sin el instrumental pertinente sería insoportablemente dolorosa, pero también muy útil y esclarecedora».
languages.original_text: "In the event these xenos units refuse to cooperate, there are ways to ensure their obedience. A lobotomy to excise certain parts of the temporal lobes, cauterise the prefrontal cortex, and extend a direct electrode bridge to their somatosensory cortex... A surgery of this kind, if performed without the necessary equipment, will be excruciating, but useful and informative."

traits.locale_text: «En caso de que estas unidades xenos se nieguen a cooperar, existen maneras de garantizar su obediencia. Una lobotomía para extirpar ciertas partes de sus lóbulos temporales, cauterizar la corteza prefrontal e implantarle un electrodo directamente en el sistema somatosensorial... Una cirugía tan invasiva llevada a cabo sin el instrumental pertinente sería insoportablemente dolorosa, pero también muy útil y esclarecedora».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu zeno birimlerinin iş birliğine yanaşmaması durumunda, itaat etmelerini sağlamanın bazı yolları vardır. Temporal lobların belirli kesimleri kesilip alınabilir, prefrontal korteks koterize edilebilir ve somatosensoriyel kortekse doğrudan elektrot köprüsü uzatmak için lobotomi yapılabilir... Böyle bir ameliyatı gerekli ekipman olmadan yapmak, acı verici ama bir o kadar da faydalı ve bilgilendirici olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "In the event these xenos units refuse to cooperate, there are ways to ensure their obedience. A lobotomy to excise certain parts of the temporal lobes, cauterise the prefrontal cortex, and extend a direct electrode bridge to their somatosensory cortex... A surgery of this kind, if performed without the necessary equipment, will be excruciating, but useful and informative."

traits.locale_text: "Bu zeno birimlerinin iş birliğine yanaşmaması durumunda, itaat etmelerini sağlamanın bazı yolları vardır. Temporal lobların belirli kesimlerini kesip almak, prefrontal korteksi koterize etmek ve somatosensoriyel kortekse doğrudan elektrot köprüsü uzatmak için lobotomi yapılırsa... Böyle bir ameliyatı gerekli ekipman olmadan yapmak, acı verici ama bir o kadar da faydalı ve bilgilendirici olacaktır."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
